SEARCH
Package org.apache.calcite.util

Interface JdbcType<T extends @Nullable Object>

Type Parameters:
T - Value type
public interface JdbcType<T extends @Nullable Object>
Maps Java types to their corresponding getters in JDBC.

In future we could add more types, and add more methods (e.g. PreparedStatement.setInt(int, int)).

  • Method Details

    • get

      T get(int column, ResultSet resultSet) throws SQLException
      Returns the value of column column from a JDBC result set.

      For example, INTEGER.get(i, resultSet) calls ResultSet.getInt(int).

      Throws:
      SQLException
